display_long_description:
Bill and Lance, from the legendary run-and-gun Contra series, join the roster of heroes fighting the AI "Index"! Contra co-op survival game mode, Bill and Lance Supreme skins, exclusive goodies & X8 app **30% off** for just **$19.99!**

[media]

X8 Contra: Super Wall Storm includes:
- Bill Supreme skin
- Lance Supreme skin
- Contra Game mode
- X8 main game package
- Exclusive character voice lines
- 5 collaboration-exclusive splats
- $9.99 X8 Coins

Contra's legendary heroes, Bill and Lance, are now fully playable in VR, and ready to bring the **action to a whole new level!**

- Team up with friends, unleash devastating powers and **survive** the relentless onslaught of Red Falcon's forces!
- Face **iconic enemies** like the Bird Human Garth or the Armadillo Bomb, leading to the terrifying final boss: Super Wall!

[media]

X8 is a highly tactical 5v5 Hero Shooter in which you take turns to Attack and Defend by planting or defusing the Syphon across maps designed to test your creative strategies.

[media]

Note to the users
X8 Contra: Super Wall Storm is a paid app that contains adds-on to the original X8.
